title: Great 1 Bed, 1 Bath floor plans at Lofts at Farmers Market
posting_body: ['Lofts at Farmers Market', 'Visit our community today!', '260 5th St E St. Paul, MN 55101', 'show contact info', 'Unit Rates:', '$1635/month', 'Unit Type:', '1-BR 1-BA', 'Unit Size:', '834 sq ft', 'Lease Terms:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'Dogs and cats welcome: Max. 2 allowed per home, deposit $200, one-time fee $200, monthly rent $40.', 'No weight limit, breed restrictions apply.', 'What you’ll find in our community:', '◾ Bike Racks', '◾ Business Center', '◾ Controlled Access', '◾ Fitness Center', '◾ Free Weight Equipment', '◾ On-Site Property Manager', '◾ Outdoor Grill', '◾ Package Receiving', '◾ Parking Garage', '◾ Pets Allowed', '◾ 24 Hour Availability', '◾ Barbecue/Grill Area', '◾ Bike Repair Stations', '◾ Community-Wide WiFi', '◾ Dry Cleaning Service Available', '◾ Kingsley Excellence Award', '◾ Pet Washing Station', '◾ Planned Social Activities', '◾ Property Manager on Site', '◾ Reservable Clubhouse', 'Description:', "Lofts at Farmers Market offers studio, one, and two bedroom floor plans that are elegantly designed with the modern conveniences that you're searching for.", 'Each unit comes with spectacular high ceilings, modern stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, cozy kitchen islands with sleek granite counters, and a full-sized washer and dryer.', 'Our community amenities also make the Lofts an exceptional place to live.', 'Work out in our 24-hour fitness center and enjoy the views from our green rooftop terrace complete with fire pit and grill.', 'Before work, be sure to stop by our coffee bar to help start the day off right.', "We're also a pet-friendly community, welcoming cats and certain dog breeds.", 'We even have an on-site pet washing station to keep your furry friend looking and smelling great!', 'This unit comes with:', '◾ Big Windows', '◾ Double Pane Windows', '◾ Exposed Ductwork', '◾ High Ceilings', '◾ High Speed Internet Access', '◾ Microwave', '◾ Open Floorplan', '◾ Pantry*', 'In Select Homes', '◾ Patio/Balcony*', 'In Select Homes', '◾ Smoke Free Community', 'Call or visit our website to schedule a personal tour!', 'Office Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Tue - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Property Management:', 'Weidner
